sermons.title: Getting to the Other Side of Your Storm
sermons.description: October 2, 2005 - When we get tired of charting our own course and invite Jesus to into our situation – He will take our hand and bring us to the other side. Religion and the plans of man will never get us through. It is a simple yielding of our own plans and control to the Almighty God and allow Him to be captain of our lives.

sermons.title: Hold Not Thy Peace, O God of My Praise
sermons.description: This is a stirring sermon to encourage us in the midst of a storm. From the Psalms and Hebrews Pastor Conlon shows us that the truth of God in our hearts will bring peace amidst the lying and hating voices around us. A wonderful exhortation against the attacks of the enemy.

sermons.title: Knowing The Voice Of Jesus In Your Storm
